transparency_law.name: Montana Public Information Law
transparency_law.statute_citation: Montana Code Annotated Title 2, Chapter 6 ยง 2-6-1006

response_requirements.initial_response_description: Executive branch: Acknowledge receipt within 5 business days. For specific, clearly identifiable, readily available records: provide within 5 working days of acknowledgment. Non-executive: Respond in timely manner.
response_requirements.no_response_consequence: District court action under constitutional right or mandamus proceedings

fee_structure.search_time_fee: Staff time for searching and retrieving records
fee_structure.notes: Reasonable fees for actual costs including copying, staff time, and administrative overhead. Cannot charge more than actual cost incurred.

exemptions.description: Personnel records and personal privacy (individual privacy must clearly exceed merits of public disclosure)

appeal_process.appeal_description: Administrative appeal to agency head (discretionary). District court action under constitutional right to know or mandamus proceedings for enforcement.
appeal_process.burden_of_proof: Individual privacy must clearly exceed merits of public disclosure to justify withholding

requester_requirements.specific_format: Be specific about records sought. Identify whether requesting from executive or non-executive agency.
requester_requirements.notes: Constitutional right to examine documents. Strong presumption favoring disclosure.

specific_obligations: Executive agencies must designate contact person
Provide specific records within 5 working days when readily available

oversight_body.name: Montana Department of Justice (guidance only)
oversight_body.role: Provides guidance on public information law. No formal enforcement authority - enforcement through constitutional right and courts.
oversight_body.statute_reference: Montana Constitution Article II, Section 9; MCA Title 2, Chapter 6
enforcement_powers: Constitutional right enforced through district courts

validation_metadata.verification_notes: Parsed from official statutory text file. Response time verified against canonical-values.json (5 business days). 6 exemptions parsed. Constitutional foundation: Privacy must clearly exceed public merit to justify withholding. Special provisions for some agencies effective October 1, 2025.
